name: getOnDemandMssqlBatchBackupResultV1
description: Returns the details for an on-demand backup of multiple Microsoft SQL databases. This only returns details for requests that have finished successfully. To check the status of the request, poll /mssql/request/{id}.

id.description: ID of the on-demand backup request.

$ul: **canceledSnapshots**: List of summary information for each canceled snapshot.
**failedSnapshots**: List of summary information for each failed snapshot.
**id**: ID of the on-demand backup request.
**successfulSnapshots**: List of summary information for each successful snapshot.
